state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, you could, like, head south. Then, head south. And then, head west. And then, make an effort to go west. And then, head west. Okay, and then, go to the west. Then, make an attempt to move west. Next, make an effort to go north. Then, travel north. If you can finish that, attempt to head west. With that done, travel south. And then, try to travel west. That done, head west. If you can get through with that, try to take a trip south. If you can get through with that, recover the coin from the floor of the shower. Alright, thanks! -= Bedchamber =- You are in a bedchamber. A typical kind of place. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Bedchamber =-0/1
